data.message:
why is the ring the first thing a male human purchases for a female? besides food?
jodi rostvold had a huge fancy wardroab from her man during high school.
why is everything ours in a marriage? that's sounds sick.
is the only time you say "I" when you get married?
weird. No wonder all the dillholes whom are cash purchasers of goods always get for fun time since they know how to say the word "I".
don't you?

to:  marshall:  I love you the best when you wear the blond wig.  My mom use to dye my hairdo blond when I was young cause she had died hairdo then too.    Moooo ha ha  [evil laugh].

replies.message: I had that poncho with me when I was recently upon a town called Motley Minnesota.  I left it on a plastic chair before my room - it was a one story motel with a sidewalk before all our windows.
